eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya warak nayirobii nagaraye di pawath wu me karunata adala samemilanayaka di mathu wi athi thathwayata hethu padaka wana pa්radhana pele manawa ka්riyakarakam hatharak pa්rakashayata path kirimata katayuthu kale ya. 1 asimanthika lesin sidu kerena beru්ga wagawa 2 simawakin thorawa wyaptha kerena thana bim 3 dara kapimen digin digatama sidu kerena wananthara winashaya 4 durwala mattamin sidu kerena warimarga ka්rama eeta samagamiwa pahathin ena karana da loka kantharakaranaya ta anubala sapayanne yayi handunagena thibe. 1 wana aawarana kisidu soya balimakin thorawa iwath kirima 2 adhika janagahana wyapthiya 3 therumak athiwath nathiwath gaswal kapa helima 4 mihithalaya unusum wima ha ba\ුnu sadhaka 1930 wana wita apa්rikawe sahara kantharaya dakunu desata wyaptha wemin athayi ha\ුna gaththath ee sambandhayen piligath mattamin awadhanaya yomu kota katayuthu kirimata jagath pa්rajawa asamath wima ada dawase wiwechanayata lak wemin thibe.
